name: This is my farm !
description:
In this First Person Shooter game you will be a farmer that don't want his farm to be seized. You will have to defend your farm against police, but  you can make it in multiplayer to make things easier for you and your mates.  

Remember story mode is currently in developement

Oh yeah ! also the game is currently translated in English and in French 

Warning : since i'm about try my luck on steam someday,  i'm working on Steam SDK so be aware that you need to have steam open to play in multiplayer (Steam will say you are playing spacewar)
